effects.display_string: Set: Tidal Waves increases the healing of affected spells by 10%.
(4) Set: Tidal Waves is 80% more effective and reduces the mana cost of affected spells by 8%.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 481,849.
(4) Set: When you cast Healing Rain, 1 ally in the radius has nsurance! applied to them. When nsurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.
